thread.title: NBO Golf Classic Grand Final: ‘Wicked tents’set to grace
thread.title_full: NBO Golf Classic Grand Final: ‘Wicked tents’set to grace

author: muscatdaily@apexmedia.co.om (Muscat Daily News)
title: NBO Golf Classic Grand Final: ‘Wicked tents’set to grace
text:
NBO Golf Classic Grand Final: ‘Wicked tents’set to grace October 14, 2015 
Wicked, Unique Structure Solutions is set to partner the European Challenge Tour’s season-ending NBO Golf Classic Grand Final taking place at Almouj Golf in Muscat from November 4-7. 
For the third consecutive year, Wicked will provide the structures and interior for the tournament. The VIP hospitality pavilion at the event will have Wicked tents installed. 
Wicked will also erect the 18th hole viewing terrace, the Majlis and the media centre using its 'Saddle Span' system. 
The NBO Golf Classic Grand Final - the most prestigious event of the year in Oman - provides the platform for Wicked to showcase its tented structures. 
“Wicked is delighted to provide structures, interiors and overlay services for the tournament and we are equally excited to have been rewarded a multi-year contract, demonstrating NBO’s faith in our company,” said Alistair McDonald, managing director and partner of Wicked Tents. 
Only the top 45 players on the Road to Oman Rankings are eligible to compete in the tournament and a prize fund of €375,000 will be up for grabs. Similar content
